snippet.title: Space Adventure for the BBC Micro
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

DOS


Game description:

An arcade adventure in which you have to find certain objects hidden in the rooms, before your oxygen runs out, and you have to constantly recharge your gun to fight off the monsters who attack you.
You also have to find 4 crystals to stop the alien menace.
